name: Axel Convertible Collar - Gold
description: An oversized, dimensional chain, Axel is a beauty with options. Wear with the toggle loops to the front to showcase a cool-girl pendant, or with the loops to the back (short or longer), for a chain statement that's simply chic and effortless. The toggle loops are created from a casting of a baroque pearl, modified into a wavy open loop from the pearl's original irregular shape. She's one special piece.

name: Axel Convertible Collar - Silver
description: An oversized, dimensional chain, Axel is a beauty with options. Wear with the toggle loops to the front to showcase a cool-girl pendant, or with the loops to the back (short or longer), for a chain statement that's simply chic and effortless. The toggle loops are created from a casting of a baroque pearl, modified into a wavy open loop from the pearl's original irregular shape. She's one special piece.

name: Aya Studs - Gold
description: Catching light & exploring movement, this wavy round loop suspends playfully from an open-link stud. This loop was created from a metal casting of a baroque pearl - modified into a flat ring shape - celebrating the pearl's natural irregular shape. We love how it moves with you.

name: Aya Studs - Silver
description: Catching light & exploring movement, this wavy round loop suspends playfully from an open-link stud. This loop was created from a metal casting of a baroque pearl - modified into a flat ring shape - celebrating the pearl's natural irregular shape. We love how it moves with you.

name: Axel Convertible Lariat - Gold
description: Did we mention we love versatility? Dimensional yet super sleek, the Axel Lariat can be worn at least 5 ways, each with their own statement. Whether you single-chain it, choker-it, or pendant-it, you'll feel beautiful in it. The toggle loops are created from a casting of a baroque pearl, modified into a wavy open loop from the pearl's original irregular shape. In short, she's a piece you'll wear often and love always.

name: Axel Convertible Lariat - Silver
description: Did we mention we love versatility? Dimensional yet super sleek, the Axel Lariat can be worn at least 5 ways, each with their own statement. Whether you single-chain it, choker-it, or pendant-it, you'll feel beautiful in it. The toggle loops are created from a casting of a baroque pearl, modified into a wavy open loop from the pearl's original irregular shape. In short, she's a piece you'll wear often and love always.

name: Axel Bracelet - Gold
description: An oversized, dimensional chain, comfortable and beautifully weighted to throw on for daily wear. Featuring a custom toggle clasp created from a metal casting of a baroque pearl - modified into a wavy open loop from the pearl's natural irregular shape.

name: Axel Bracelet - Silver
description: An oversized, dimensional chain, comfortable and beautifully weighted to throw on for daily wear. Featuring a custom toggle clasp created from a metal casting of a baroque pearl - modified into a wavy open loop from the pearl's natural irregular shape.

name: Axel Chainlink Studs - Gold
description: Dimensional yet sleek, these lightweight studs sit perpendicular on the earlobe. Each component is separately cast by hand and polished to a mirror finish, designed to mimic a round chainlink.

name: Axel Chainlink Studs - Silver
description: Dimensional yet sleek, these lightweight studs sit perpendicular on the earlobe. Each component is separately cast by hand and polished to a mirror finish, designed to mimic a round chainlink.

name: Molten Studs - Gold
description: Catch that glow! We've got gentle, light-reflecting curves for days. The Molten Studs were created from two symmetrical genuine flameball pearls (to make a pair & frame the face) that were first hand-cast, then hollowed out for lightweight wearability, hand-polished to a mirror finish, and then plated in gold. These studs have had quite the journey to their final spectacular destination - your pretty ears.

name: Molten Studs - Silver
description: Catch that glow! We've got gentle, light-reflecting curves for days. The Molten Studs were created from two symmetrical genuine flameball pearls (to make a pair & frame the face) that were first hand-cast, then hollowed out for lightweight wearability, hand-polished to a mirror finish, and then plated in rhodium. These studs have had quite the journey to their final spectacular destination - your pretty ears.

name: Molten Ring - Gold
description: Mysterious yet strikingly beautiful - pearls are a beacon of light from the water's depths. The Molten Ring was created from a genuine flameball pearl that was first hand-cast, then hollowed out for lightweight wearability, hand-polished to a mirror finish, and then plated in rhodium. She's comfortable and timeless, and a conversation piece for years to come.
